1.name: High News
1.description: High News is a 24-hour Bengali news channel launched by the company High Media Infotainment INDIA Ltd. in 2010. The company also runs a Bengali newspaper.

2.name: Republic Bangla
2.description: #RepublicBangla #ArnabGoswami #RBangla #RepublicBanglaLIVE AND, THE WAIT IS OVER, Republic Bangla is now LIVE with Arnab Goswami! Editor-in-Chief of the Republic Media Network Arnab Goswami is proud to formally announce the launch of Republic Bangla! The new wave of Bengali journalism is here. Watch the latest political news, fastest breaking news and most accurate election coverage only on Republic Bangla.

3.name: DD Bangla
3.description: DD Bangla is an Indian Bengali-language free-to-air state-owned television channel owned by state-owned broadcaster Doordarshan Network. It was formerly known as DD-7 and DD National Kolkata.

4.name: Kolkata TV
4.description: Latest News Headlines, Bengali News, Kolkata News, latest Bengali News, Top 10 News Today, Breaking News from Kolkata, India and World on Kolkata TV. Watch Latest Photos, Videos from Bollywood, Election News Updates and Kolkata TV News LIVE TV here.

5.name: ABP Ananda
5.description: ABP Ananda LIVE TV:  Latest Bengali news on ABP Ananda. Follow Ghanta Khanek Sange Suman and your favorite show live. Catch Cricket World Cup 2023, TET Protest,  Panchayat Elections 2023 and others with এবিপি আনন্দ লাইভ টিভি. Bangla News 24x7 | Latest Bangla News, Bengali Breaking News | দেখুন লাইভ টিভি - এবিপি আনন্দ | Bangla News LIVE TV 24x7

6.name: TV9 Bangla
6.description: TV9 Bangla LIVE TV- Watch the Latest and Breaking News LIVE in Bengali, এ দেখুন বাংলা লেটেস্ট ও ব্রেকিং নিউজ at tv9bangla.com

7.name: News18 বাংলা
7.description: News18 বাংলা - Get all breaking and latest news in Bangla on News18 Bengali. Read Bangla khobor (বাংলা খবর) on Sports, Cricket, Lifestyle, entertainment and more.

8.name: Zee 24 Ghanta
8.description: Watch 24 Ghanta live bangla khobor on Zee News Bengali. Stay updated on breaking bangla khobor online, Kolkata news, exclusive news updates only on Zee 24 Ghata.

9.name: Rplus
9.description: Rplus presents Bengal News Live stream. If you are looking for latest Kolkata News live a 24 ghanta Bengali News in your fingertips.

10.name: News Time
10.description: The only authentic source of latest news and updates in politics, sports, entertainment, business and science. Special emphasis on Kolkata and West Bengal.

11.name: Samay Kolkata
11.description: Samay Kolkata a Bengali News Website Provides Latest News and Breaking News in Bangla. Get Today's News Headlines from Kolkata latest update in Bengali by Samay Kolkata.

12.name: Tara News
12.description: Tara Newz was an Indian Bengali-language satellite and cable 24-hour news and current affairs television channel owned by the Saradha Group, a chit fund company.

13.name: News Bartaman
13.description: News Bartaman 24x7 - খবরের উড়ান, খবরের সন্ধান - Bengali News Today - Bengali News Update - Bengali News Live - Breaking News Bangla
